trans-unit.source: Defines an interest in specific workflow status events that occur in a root workflow instance; used for matching by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" /> in a tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: 定义对发生在根工作流实例中的特定工作流事件的关注；用于按跟踪配置文件中的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" /> 进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: Whenever the status of the workflow instance changes, the workflow instance emits a workflow status event based on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 当工作流实例的状态发生更改时，工作流实例将基于 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> 值之一向运行时跟踪基础结构发出工作流状态事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> expresses an interest in locations of the workflow instance where specific types of workflow status events occur.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> 表示对工作流实例中发生特定类型工作流状态事件的位置的关注。

trans-unit.source: Add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> to specify the workflow status events to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> 值添加到 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> 以指定要匹配的工作流状态事件。

trans-unit.source: A single <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 单一 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> 可以引用工作流实例的可能执行路径中的多个实际位置。

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in order to define the match parameters for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> 添加到 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，以便定义 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> 的匹配参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: No workflow status events to match are specified.
trans-unit.target: 未指定要匹配的工作流状态事件。

trans-unit.source: You must add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to match any workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: 必须将 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> 值添加到 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> 才能使 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> 与任何工作流状态事件匹配。

trans-unit.source: IList of tracking workflow events to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 要匹配的跟踪工作流事件的列表。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> class that matches the specified tracking workflow events.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> 类的新实例，该类与指定的跟踪工作流事件匹配。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of workflow status events that will be matched for this location.
trans-unit.target: 获取将为此位置匹配的工作流状态事件的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent" /> values that specifies the workflow status events for which the location will be matched.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent" /> 值的列表，该列表指定将为其匹配位置的工作流状态事件。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty list.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> contains the list of workflow status events for which this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> will be matched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> 包含将为其匹配此 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> 的工作流状态事件的列表。

trans-unit.source: You can track the specified workflow status events by adding the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is part of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> 添加到 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A>（属于 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>）中的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>，您可以跟踪指定的工作流状态事件。
